entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
